snippet: A 368-square-mile national park was closed as dozens of officers searched for the gunman over snowy and rugged terrain.
abstract: Washington's Mount Rainier National Park is closed after park ranger Margaret Anderson was fatally shot during a traffic stop; dozens of officers are searching for the gunman over park's snowy and rugged terrain.
lead_paragraph: A 368-square-mile national park was closed as dozens of officers searched for the gunman over snowy and rugged terrain.

headline.seo: Park Ranger’s Killer Is Sought Near Mount Rainier
headline.main: Ranger’s Killer Is Sought Near Mount Rainier
headline.print_headline: Ranger’s Killer Is Sought Near Mount Rainier
